Module it.polimi.ingsw.am45
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am45.model.player

Class Hand

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am45.model.player.Hand
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameListener
public class Hand extends Object implements GameListener
The player's Hand in the game that contains the cards that the player can play on his Board.
